Description:
This dataset represents an economic activity to calculate the depreciation of Advanced manufacturing facility. It includes direct costs for the construction of the buildings including preliminaries costs.
Reference: "International construction market survey 2024" by Turner & Townsend (https://publications.turnerandtownsend.com/international-construction-market-survey-2024/regional-insights-and-data/)
Geopgraphy: The collected dataset represents Germany based on data for Munich
Time period: The data were collected in 2023
Exchange rate: March 2023
Reference: Turner & Townsend International construction market survey 2024

Description: This dataset represents an economic activity to calculate the depreciation of Advanced manufacturing facility as global average. It includes direct costs for the construction of the buildings including preliminaries costs.

This dataset represents an economic activity to calculate the depreciation of Advanced manufacturing facility. It is calculated based on the country index with Amsterdam=100.
Reference: by Arcadis (https://images.connect.arcadis.com/Web/Arcadis/%7B856573cb-2409-4448-96a6-852638aa24fd%7D_International-Construction-Costs-2024.pdf)
Geopgraphy: The collected dataset represents Sweden based on data for Stockholm
Time period: The data were collected in 2023
